caption.p:
Locations of weather stations considered in this study (see blue dots). RCM simulations were used to project TX95 values and HW metrics for future climate scenarios (RCP4.5 and RCP 8.5) for 9 major cities (see yellow dots). The elevation map was created using the CGIAR-CSI SRTM dataset
91 . Plot was generated by using Pythonâ€™s Matplotlib Library
